channel.title: Few questions
channel.description:
well i started a server yesterday, an i ned to know some stuff.
What is a client?
Whats the purpose of a client?
Cant a just add autospawn, shops.cfg and other things like that to the consle or do i need a client fo that?
I looked at the client page...but that didnt bring much help.
Take note that im just starting java, and its still a little new too me.
Thanks guys. :)

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

A client is what you use to connect and play. Without a client you couldn play. A server is the game. So you turn on the server get on the client to play. You don’t need a client to add all that stuff you just mentioned.

Read full topic
